channel.title: How to make duel arena/c-wars bank chests bankable [Pi]
channel.description: Questions pretty much in title lol, how do i make it so when someone clicks on a bank chest at the duel arena or c-wars it opens their bank.

item.title: How to make duel arena/c-wars bank chests bankable [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]ActionHandler, firstClickObject.

Add the item ids to the switch statement, and use the following method:

c.getPA().openUpBank();

That may not be the bank method, as I’m doing this from meory. (Haven’t used PI in months)[/quote][quote=“I Vain I”]ActionHandler, firstClickObject.

Add the item ids to the switch statement, and use the following method:

c.getPA().openUpBank();

Thank you, will give it a shot
That may not be the bank method, as I’m doing this from meory. (Haven’t used PI in months)[/quote]

Read full topic
